titleStmt.title: The ancient bounds, or Liberty of conscience tenderly stated, modestly asserted, and mildly vindicated.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Rous the elder by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
